title: WellNest
description: Developed WellNest, a secure mental health platform with Spring Boot, React, and MySQL, featuring JWT authentication, RESTful APIs, and automated chat.

title: Readme AI
description: Built ReadMe AI, a learning platform that converts text to interactive videos with React, Django, 3D avatars, Azure TTS, JWT security, and AI-driven visuals and quizzes.

title: NGOLogs
description: Created NGOLogs, a Java Swing app with MySQL, allowing users to browse Pune NGOs, view missions, and donate or volunteer, with CRUD operations and PL/SQL data handling.
